extDescription.message: LinkShield helps you identify unsafe websites and links to keep you safer online.

alertMessage.message: This website contains a link to:

adviceCheckUrl.message: Only open this link if you fully trust the sender. When in doubt, don't click. Never enter your password on a site you don't trust.

noHttps.message: The connection to this website is not secure (no HTTPS). Others may be able to see your information.

ipAsDomain.message: This website uses an IP address instead of a domain name. This is unusual and very risky.

tooManySubdomains.message: This web address has many subdomains (e.g., part1.part2.site.com). This can indicate an unsafe site (medium risk).

suspiciousKeywords.message: The link contains words often associated with scams (low risk).

suspiciousPattern.message: The structure of this web address seems unusual (medium risk).

shortenedUrl.message: This is a shortened link (like bit.ly). The actual destination is not immediately visible (medium risk).

downloadPage.message: This link appears to download a file. Only open files that you fully trust (medium risk).

freeHosting.message: This website uses a free hosting platform. Scammers sometimes take advantage of this (medium risk).

encodedCharacters.message: The link contains unusual characters (low risk). This can be used to hide the real destination.

homoglyphAttack.message: This address contains look-alike characters (high risk). Verify you're on the correct site before entering any information.

metaRedirect.message: This website automatically redirects you. This can lead to an unsafe site (medium risk).

cryptoPhishing.message: This link appears to be a crypto scam (high risk). Be extra careful with your wallet and credentials.

externalScripts.message: This site loads code from an external source that has been marked as risky.

suspiciousParams.message: The link contains technical parameters that are sometimes used for unsafe actions (low risk).

mixedContent.message: This secure page is also loading insecure content. This is a security risk (medium risk).

unusualPort.message: This site uses an unusual technical port. This may be an attempt to bypass security (medium risk).

javascriptScheme.message: This link attempts to execute code directly in your browser (high risk).

urlFragmentTrick.message: The link contains an unusually long fragment. This is a technique sometimes used to mislead (low risk).

suspiciousTLD.message: This website uses a domain extension (like .zip or .mov) that is often abused for scams (high risk).

base64OrHex.message: This link contains heavily encoded information. This is often used to hide malicious code (high risk).

similarToLegitimateDomain.message: This site looks very similar to a well-known, trusted site. Check the address carefully, it could be a fake copy.

youngDomain.message: This domain was registered only $AGE$ days ago (high risk). New domains are more frequently used for scams.

insecureLoginPage.message: This login page is not secure (no HTTPS). Never enter your password here (high risk).

loginPageNoMX.message: This login page belongs to a domain that cannot receive email. This is very risky (high risk).

malwareExtension.message: This link leads to a file that could be harmful (such as .exe or .zip). Do not download it (high risk).

popupSubtitle.message: Stay safe with real-time alerts and protection.

backgroundAnalysisDescription.message: Stops even the newest threats hourly

activationRequired.message: Enable this feature to use it.

integratedProtectionDescription.message: Warns before you click risky links

premiumFeaturesActive.message: You are now using the premium version!

upgradePrompt.message: Upgrade to premium for extra features.

bulkUrlCheckDescription.message: Upload a .txt file to check a list of links.

fileCheckNoUrls.message: The selected file does not contain any links.

safeDomain.message: This is a known, safe website.

allowedProtocol.message: This link uses a safe protocol (such as 'mailto:' or 'tel:').

invalidUrl.message: This web address is invalid or misspelled.

highRisk.message: Warning! This site is likely dangerous.

lowRisk.message: Minor warning. Verify you trust this site.

siteStatusNotAvailable.message: The status of this site is not available.

sslValidationFailed.message: The security certificate of this website is invalid.

shortenedUrlError.message: Could not check the final destination of this shortened link.

redirectedShortenedUrl.message: This shortened link redirects you to another website.

cryptoPhishingAd.message: This ad has characteristics of a crypto scam (high risk).

suspiciousAdStructure.message: The link of this ad has an unusual structure (medium risk).

suspiciousAdTLD.message: This ad uses a domain extension that is often abused (medium risk).

homoglyphAdAttack.message: The ad uses characters that are nearly identical to a known website (medium risk).

brandMisuse.message: The ad is wrongfully using a well-known brand name (high risk).

unknownWarning.message: An unknown risk has been found. Be extra cautious.

typosquattingAttack.message: This address looks almost like a well-known website, but contains a small spelling difference. For example: 'arnazon.com' instead of 'amazon.com'. Always double-check the spelling before logging in.

downloadKeyword.message: The link contains words related to downloads (low risk). Only open files you trust.

suspiciousScriptContent.message: A script on this page contains risky code. This may be unsafe.

invalidScriptSrc.message: The link to a script on this page is incorrect.

mixedScripts.message: This address mixes letters from different alphabets (like English and Russian). While they look the same, they create a completely different web address.

introBannerMessage.message: LinkShield is active and marks risky links with ⚠️. Hover over the icon to see why.

digitHomoglyph.message: This domain uses digits that look like letters to imitate a known brand (high risk). For example: g00gle uses zeros instead of 'o'.

trustedTLD.message: This domain has a standard domain extension (low risk).

suspiciousPageText.message: The text on this page contains words often used in scams (high risk).

urgencyTactic.message: This page uses urgent language to pressure you (high risk). Beware of scams.

severityMediumRisk.message: Medium risk: this link may be unsafe. Be careful.

allowedQueryParam.message: The link contains a safe, allowed technical parameter.

suspiciousIframeAdComponent.message: This page loads an ad component from another website.

suspiciousIframeTracking.message: This page loads a tracker that can monitor your Browse behavior.

suspiciousIframeMalicious.message: A potentially harmful component has been found on this page (such as phishing).

suspiciousIframeHidden.message: A risky, invisible element has been found on the page.

mixedContentIframe.message: This secure page is loading an insecure component. This is a security risk.

invalidIframeSrc.message: A component on this page could not be loaded correctly (invalid source).

iframeHidden.message: A risky, invisible element has been found on the page.

typosquattingAttack_adobe_com.message: This web address looks like adobe.com but is deliberately misspelled (high risk).

typosquattingAttack_alibaba_com.message: This web address looks like alibaba.com but is deliberately misspelled (high risk).

typosquattingAttack_amazon_com.message: This web address looks like amazon.com but is deliberately misspelled (high risk).

typosquattingAttack_x_com.message: This web address looks like x.com but is deliberately misspelled (high risk).

homoglyphAttack_amazon_com.message: This address uses characters that are nearly identical to amazon.com (high risk).

homoglyphAttack_x_com.message: This address uses characters that are nearly identical to x.com (high risk).

homoglyphAttack_facebook_com.message: This address uses characters that are nearly identical to facebook.com (high risk).

homoglyphAttack_adobe_com.message: This address uses characters that are nearly identical to adobe.com (high risk).

homoglyphAttack_paypal_com.message: This address uses characters that are nearly identical to paypal.com (high risk).

typosquatting_microsoft_com.message: This address looks very similar to microsoft.com (high risk). It could be a fake page.

typosquatting_apple_com.message: This address looks very similar to apple.com (high risk). It could be a fake page.

typosquatting_google_com.message: This address looks very similar to google.com (high risk). It could be a fake page.

typosquatting_linkedin_com.message: This address looks very similar to linkedin.com (high risk). It could be a fake page.

typosquatting_alibaba_com.message: This address looks very similar to alibaba.com (high risk). It could be a fake page.

typosquatting_whatsapp_com.message: This address looks very similar to whatsapp.com (high risk). It could be a fake page.

typosquatting_amazon_com.message: This address looks very similar to amazon.com (high risk). It could be a fake page.

typosquatting_x_com.message: This address looks very similar to x.com (high risk). It could be a fake page.

typosquatting_facebook_com.message: This address looks very similar to facebook.com (high risk). It could be a fake page.

typosquatting_adobe_com.message: This address looks very similar to adobe.com (high risk). It could be a fake page.

typosquatting_paypal_com.message: This address looks very similar to paypal.com (high risk). It could be a fake page.

similarToLegitimateDomain_microsoft_com.message: This site looks like microsoft.com, check the address carefully.

similarToLegitimateDomain_apple_com.message: This site looks like apple.com, check the address carefully.

similarToLegitimateDomain_google_com.message: This site looks like google.com, check the address carefully.

similarToLegitimateDomain_linkedin_com.message: This site looks like linkedin.com, check the address carefully.

similarToLegitimateDomain_adobe_com.message: This site looks like adobe.com, check the address carefully.

similarToLegitimateDomain_paypal_com.message: This site looks like paypal.com, check the address carefully.

suspiciousPunycodeDecoding_microsoft_com.message: This link uses unusual characters to look like microsoft.com (high risk).

suspiciousPunycodeDecoding_apple_com.message: This link uses unusual characters to look like apple.com (high risk).

suspiciousPunycodeDecoding_google_com.message: This link uses unusual characters to look like google.com (high risk).

suspiciousPunycodeDecoding_x_com.message: This link uses unusual characters to look like x.com (high risk).

suspiciousPunycodeDecoding_facebook_com.message: This link uses unusual characters to look like facebook.com (high risk).

suspiciousPunycodeDecoding_adobe_com.message: This link uses unusual characters to look like adobe.com (high risk).

extDescriptionFull.message: Protects you from fake websites, phishing, and online scams. So you can browse worry-free.

licenseTrialSubtitle.message: You're fully protected. All features are active.

licenseExpiredSubtitle.message: Basic protection is still active. Reactivate Premium to unlock advanced scanning and hourly updates.

licenseBenefitsText.message: Latest phishing sites blocked (updated hourly), QR codes scanned, 24/7 protection

licensePremiumSubtitle.message: All security features are active. Thanks for your trust!

manageSubscriptionTooltip.message: Change payment method, cancel or view invoices

licenseDeactivateButton.message: Use license key on another device

licenseDeactivateConfirm.message: This will release the license from this device, allowing you to use it elsewhere.

licenseDeactivatedSuccess.message: License deactivated. You can now activate it on another device.

trialExpiredMessage.message: Your trial has ended. You still have basic protection — upgrade anytime to restore all features.

gumroadErrorLicenseNotExistProduct.message: This license key does not exist for this product

gumroadErrorLicenseNotExist.message: This license key does not exist

gumroadErrorLicenseRevoked.message: This license has been refunded or revoked

gumroadErrorNetwork.message: Network error during validation. Please check your internet connection.

reason_redirectChain.message: Suspicious redirect chain detected. The link passes through multiple servers before reaching its destination.

reason_excessiveRedirects.message: Too many redirects in chain (high risk). This link redirects more than 5 times, which is often used to hide the true destination.

reason_domainHopping.message: Multiple domain switches in redirect chain (high risk). The link jumps between many different websites.

reason_chainedShorteners.message: Multiple URL shorteners chained together (medium risk). Legitimate links rarely use multiple shortening services.

reason_suspiciousFinalTLD.message: Final destination has a suspicious domain extension (high risk). The actual endpoint uses a risky TLD.

reason_redirectToIP.message: Redirect leads to IP address (high risk). The final destination is a raw IP address instead of a domain name.

reason_redirectTimeout.message: Redirect analysis timed out (medium risk). Could not fully trace the redirect chain within the time limit.

atSymbolPhishing.message: CRITICAL: This link uses an @ symbol to hide the real destination (high risk). The address before @ is fake - you will actually go to a different website.

atSymbolInPath.message: The link contains an @ symbol in the path which may be used for obfuscation (medium risk).

doubleEncoding.message: This link uses double URL encoding to hide its true content (high risk). This is a common technique to bypass security filters.

fullwidthCharacters.message: This link uses fullwidth Unicode characters that look like normal letters (high risk). This is a trick to make fake websites look legitimate.

nullByteInjection.message: This link contains a null byte character (high risk). This is a hacking technique that can be used to bypass security checks.

reason_atSymbolPhishing.message: CRITICAL: Credential URL attack detected. The visible domain is fake - you will be redirected to a different website.

reason_doubleEncoding.message: Double URL encoding detected (high risk). This obfuscation technique is used to hide malicious content.

reason_fullwidthCharacters.message: Fullwidth Unicode characters detected (high risk). These special characters imitate normal letters to deceive users.

reason_nullByteInjection.message: Null byte injection detected (high risk). This technique is used to bypass security filters and can indicate a malicious link.

formActionHijacking.message: This login form sends your credentials to an external website (critical risk). Your username and password may be stolen.

formActionExternal.message: Login form submits data to external domain: $DOMAIN$ (critical risk). This is a credential theft attempt.

formActionInvalid.message: Login form has invalid or suspicious action URL (high risk). Your credentials may not be sent securely.

hiddenIframeZeroSize.message: Hidden iframe with zero size detected (high risk). This can be used to load malicious content invisibly.

hiddenIframeOffScreen.message: Iframe positioned off-screen detected (high risk). Hidden content may be tracking you or stealing data.

hiddenIframeCSSHidden.message: CSS-hidden iframe detected (high risk). Invisible frames can capture keystrokes or load malware.

hiddenIframeNegativePos.message: Iframe with negative positioning detected (medium risk). This technique is used to hide content from users.

nrdCritical.message: CRITICAL: Domain registered $DAYS$ day(s) ago (critical risk). Brand new domains are extremely likely to be malicious.

nrdHigh.message: Domain registered only $DAYS$ days ago (high risk). Very new domains are frequently used for scams.

nrdMedium.message: Domain registered $DAYS$ days ago (medium risk). New domains under 30 days warrant extra caution.

nrdLow.message: Domain registered $DAYS$ days ago (low risk). Relatively new domain, exercise some caution.

licenseErrorNotFound.message: License key not found. Please check your input.

licenseErrorActivationLimit.message: You've reached your device limit (3). Go to any active device and choose 'Use on another device' to free up a slot.

licenseErrorNetwork.message: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.

licenseErrorUnknown.message: An unknown error occurred during validation.

invalidUrlFormat.message: Invalid URL format. The web address could not be parsed correctly.

invalidDomain.message: Invalid domain. The website address is malformed or incomplete.

trustedDomain.message: This is a trusted domain that has been verified as safe.

errorCalculatingRisk.message: Error calculating risk score. Please try again.

punycodeDecodingError.message: Error decoding international characters in the domain name.

fileProtocol.message: This link uses the file:// protocol which accesses local files.

invalidHostname.message: Invalid hostname. The domain name format is incorrect.

urlTooLong.message: This URL is unusually long (medium risk). Very long URLs can be used to hide malicious content.

nonAscii.message: This URL contains non-ASCII characters that may be used for deception.

typosquattingPattern.message: This domain matches a typosquatting pattern (high risk). It appears to be impersonating a legitimate website.

suspiciousIframes.message: Suspicious iframe elements detected on this page.

suspiciousScripts.message: Suspicious scripts detected on this page.

hiddenIframes.message: Hidden iframe elements detected on this page that may be used for malicious purposes.

unifiedCheckError.message: Error during security check. Some checks may not have completed.

initializationError.message: Error initializing security scanner. Please reload the page.

asciiQrDangerTitle.message: Dangerous Link in ASCII QR Code

asciiQrCautionTitle.message: Suspicious Link in ASCII QR Code

installNotificationMessage.message: You are now protected against phishing and malicious websites.

clipboardHijackingMessage.message: This page is attempting to modify your clipboard. Be careful when pasting wallet addresses or sensitive data.

reason_clipboardHijackingCrypto.message: CRITICAL: This page hijacks your clipboard with crypto addresses (critical risk). Copied wallet addresses may be replaced with attacker addresses.

reason_clipboardHijackingDetected.message: This page manipulates your clipboard content (high risk). Pasted content may differ from what you copied.

brandSubdomainPhishing.message: Brand keyword detected on free hosting platform (high risk). Legitimate companies don't use free hosting for official services.

reason_brandSubdomainPhishing.message: Brand keyword detected on free hosting platform (high risk). Legitimate companies don't use free hosting for official services.

hostnameBrandKeywordPhishing.message: Suspicious domain: brand name combined with phishing keywords (high risk). Example: login-microsoft-verify.com is NOT a Microsoft site.

reason_hostnameBrandKeywordPhishing.message: Suspicious domain: brand name combined with phishing keywords (high risk). Example: login-microsoft-verify.com is NOT a Microsoft site.

nrdTelCombo.message: Phone number on newly registered domain with phishing keywords (medium risk). This may be a vishing (voice phishing) attempt.

reason_nrdTelCombo.message: Phone number on newly registered domain with phishing keywords (medium risk). This may be a vishing (voice phishing) attempt.

reason_opaqueRedirectChain.message: Opaque redirect detected (low risk). The redirect destination could not be fully traced.

reason_opaqueRedirectToIP.message: Opaque redirect to IP address (high risk). The hidden redirect leads to a raw IP address instead of a domain.

reason_opaqueRedirectSuspiciousTLD.message: Opaque redirect to suspicious domain extension (medium risk). The hidden redirect leads to a risky TLD.

reason_opaqueRedirectNRD.message: Opaque redirect to newly registered domain (high risk). The hidden redirect leads to a very new domain.

bitbWarningMessage.message: This page is displaying a simulated browser window that mimics a real login popup. This is a Browser-in-the-Browser (BitB) attack designed to steal your credentials. The 'popup' is actually just HTML/CSS made to look like a real browser window.

reason_bitbAttackDetected.message: Browser-in-the-Browser attack detected (critical risk). This page displays a fake browser window to steal your login credentials.

reason_bitbFakeUrlBar.message: Fake URL bar detected showing trusted domain (critical risk). The displayed address is fake and designed to deceive you.

reason_bitbWindowControls.message: Fake window controls detected (high risk). Close/minimize buttons are simulated to appear like a real popup.

reason_bitbLoginFormInOverlay.message: Login form inside overlay detected (high risk). Real login popups open in separate browser windows, not overlays.

reason_bitbOAuthBranding.message: OAuth branding with login form in overlay (high risk). 'Sign in with Google/Microsoft' buttons in fake popups are credential theft.

reason_bitbPadlockIcon.message: Fake security padlock icon detected (medium risk). Real padlocks appear in browser address bar, not in page content.

reason_bitbWindowChrome.message: Simulated browser window styling detected (medium risk). The overlay is styled to look like an operating system window.

reason_bitbIframeInModal.message: Iframe inside modal overlay detected (low risk). This may be used to load external login content.

clickFixMessage.message: This page contains a suspicious command that could harm your computer. Do not copy or execute this command.

clickFixSubMessage.message: Attackers often disguise malicious commands as 'fixes' or 'verification steps'. Never run commands from untrusted sources.

bitbAttackMessage.message: This page is showing a fake browser window designed to steal your credentials. Real login popups open in separate browser windows.

bitbAttackTip.message: Always check the browser address bar for the real URL, not text displayed within the page.

formHijackingMessage.message: This page attempted to redirect your login credentials to an external server. Your data was NOT sent.
formHijackingMessage.description: Message explaining form hijacking was blocked

formHijackingTip.message: The form was secretly modified to send your data to:
formHijackingTip.description: Tip showing the malicious target domain

tooltipTitle.description: Title for smart link scanning tooltip

shadowDomLoginForm.message: Login form hidden in Shadow DOM detected (high risk). This technique is used to evade security scanners.

shadowDomPhishingOverlay.message: Phishing overlay hidden in Shadow DOM detected (critical risk). Shadow DOM is being used to hide malicious content.

shadowDomIframe.message: Suspicious iframe hidden in Shadow DOM detected (high risk). Hidden iframes can be used for credential theft.

urlCredentialsAttack.message: URL contains credentials in an attack format (critical risk). The visible domain is fake - you will be redirected elsewhere.

nrdUltraCritical.message: Domain registered only hours ago (critical risk). This is extremely suspicious and commonly used for phishing.

nrdVishingCombo.message: Phone number on newly registered domain with phishing indicators (high risk). This may be a vishing (voice phishing) attempt.

tableBasedQR.message: QR code hidden in HTML table detected (medium risk). This technique is used to bypass image-based QR detection.

tableQrDangerTitle.message: Dangerous Link in Hidden QR Code

tableQrCautionTitle.message: Suspicious Link in Hidden QR Code

hiddenQrDetected.message: Hidden QR code detected in page content. This may contain a malicious URL.

bitbAttackCritical.message: CRITICAL: Browser-in-the-Browser attack detected! This page displays a fake login window designed to steal your credentials.

bitbAttackWarning.message: Warning: Suspicious popup detected that may be a Browser-in-the-Browser attack. Verify the URL carefully.

clickFixDetected.message: ClickFix attack detected! This page contains a malicious command disguised as a fix or verification step. Do not copy or execute it.

clipboardHijacking.message: Clipboard hijacking detected! This page is attempting to modify your clipboard content without permission.

hiddenIframe.message: Hidden iframe detected on this page. Invisible frames can be used for tracking, credential theft, or malware delivery.

typosquatting.message: Spelling trick detected: This website name is almost identical to a trusted site, but with a subtle difference. Scammers use this to create convincing fake pages.

ipAddressDomain.message: This website uses an IP address instead of a domain name. This is highly unusual and often indicates malicious intent.

extremeSubdomains.message: Extreme number of subdomains detected. This technique is often used to hide malicious URLs or impersonate legitimate sites.

vishingDetected.message: Potential vishing (voice phishing) attack detected. This page combines phone numbers with phishing indicators.

punycodeDetected.message: This web address uses special characters that look like normal letters but aren't. For example, a Cyrillic 'a' looks identical to a Latin 'a'. This trick makes fake sites appear legitimate.

trustedDomainSkipped.message: This domain has been marked as trusted by you.

gracePeriodActive.message: We couldn't verify your license online. Your protection continues for $DAYS$ more days while we retry.

gracePeriodWarning.message: License verification pending. Please connect to the internet within the next $DAYS$ days to maintain uninterrupted protection.

gracePeriodExpired.message: We haven't been able to verify your license for 7 days. Please connect to the internet to restore premium features.

gracePeriodRestored.message: License verified successfully. Your protection is fully active.

siteSafeSuccess.message: No threats detected. This site passed all security checks.

siteSafeSuccessDetail.message: LinkShield scanned this page for phishing, typosquatting, and malicious scripts. Everything looks good.

backgroundSecurityHelp.message: Requires an active license. Activate Premium to enable automatic protection.

clipboardHijackingCryptoTip.message: Always verify wallet addresses before sending cryptocurrency. Attackers replace addresses in your clipboard.

clipboardHijackingTip.message: This site may be trying to replace content you copy. Always verify pasted content.

webTransportWarningMessage.message: This page is using advanced network protocols in a potentially suspicious way.

webTransportDirectIP.message: Connection to direct IP address detected.

webTransportHighPort.message: Connection to unusual high port number.

webTransportRandomSubdomain.message: Connection to suspicious random subdomain (possible C2 server).

webTransportFreeTLD.message: Connection to free TLD domain (commonly used for malware).

webTransportHighDatagramRate.message: Unusually high data transfer rate detected.

failSafeNetworkMessage.message: Could not verify license due to network issues. Protection remains active in safe mode.

failSafeGraceMessage.message: Please connect to the internet to verify your license. Protection remains active.

failSafePreservedMessage.message: Your protection rules are preserved. Please verify your license when possible.

failSafeDefaultMessage.message: LinkShield is running in safe mode. Protection remains active.

visualHijackingMessage.message: A hidden overlay was detected trying to intercept your click. This is a common phishing technique used to redirect you to malicious sites.

transparentHighZIndexOverlay.message: Transparent overlay with high z-index detected

reportPhishingSuccess.message: Reported! Thank you for helping improve security.

pointerEventsNoneHighZIndex.message: CRITICAL: A transparent clickjacking overlay was detected (critical risk). An invisible element with maximum z-index is trying to intercept your interactions.

intMaxZIndexOverlay.message: CRITICAL: A suspicious overlay with maximum z-index was detected (critical risk). This may be an attempt to hijack your clicks.

fullscreenPointerEventsNone.message: Full-screen invisible overlay detected (critical risk). This page may be attempting to capture your interactions.

suspiciousLinkZIndex.message: This link uses an extremely high z-index positioning (critical risk). This is a click hijacking attack technique where malicious links are layered above legitimate content.

suspiciousContainerZIndex.message: This link is inside a container with suspicious z-index positioning (critical risk). The page may be attempting to trick you into clicking malicious content.

dangerousJavascriptUri.message: CRITICAL: This link contains executable JavaScript code (critical risk). Clicking it could run malicious scripts in your browser.

dangerousVbscriptUri.message: CRITICAL: This link contains executable VBScript code (critical risk). This is a dangerous attack technique targeting Windows systems.

dangerousDataUri.message: CRITICAL: This link contains embedded data that could execute code (critical risk). Data URIs can be used for phishing or malware delivery.

criticalSecurityThreat.message: CRITICAL SECURITY THREAT: This link has been identified as extremely dangerous. Do not click under any circumstances.

mixedScriptAttack.message: CRITICAL: This web address mixes characters from different alphabets (e.g., Latin and Cyrillic). This is a sophisticated spoofing attack where characters that look identical are from different scripts.

nonAsciiDomain.message: This domain contains non-ASCII characters (high risk). International characters in domain names can be used to impersonate legitimate websites.

homoglyphCharactersDetected.message: CRITICAL: Homoglyph characters detected in this domain (critical risk). Characters that look like Latin letters but are actually from other scripts (e.g., Cyrillic) are being used to impersonate a legitimate website.

dangerousBlobUri.message: CRITICAL: This link contains a Blob URL (critical risk). Blob URLs can be used to execute malicious code or deliver malware.

dataUriBlocked.message: CRITICAL: This link contains a data: URI (critical risk). Data URIs can embed and execute malicious content directly in your browser. This is a common attack vector for phishing and malware delivery.

javascriptUriBlocked.message: CRITICAL: This link contains a javascript: URI (critical risk). JavaScript URIs can execute arbitrary code in your browser context, potentially stealing your data or credentials.

vbscriptUriBlocked.message: CRITICAL: This link contains a vbscript: URI (critical risk). VBScript URIs can execute dangerous code targeting Windows systems. This is a serious security threat.

blobUriBlocked.message: CRITICAL: This link contains a blob: URI (critical risk). Blob URIs can execute arbitrary code or deliver malware. This link has been blocked for your protection.

mathematicalCharsDetected.message: This domain contains Mathematical Unicode characters (high risk). Mathematical symbols that look like regular letters (like bold or italic variants) are being used to impersonate a legitimate website.

greekCharsDetected.message: This domain contains Greek characters mixed with Latin letters (high risk). Greek letters like omicron (ο) and nu (ν) look identical to Latin 'o' and 'v', making this a potential spoofing attack.

scriptCharsDetected.message: This domain contains Letterlike Symbols (high risk). Special Unicode script characters are being used to impersonate a legitimate website.

digitInDomainDetected.message: This domain uses digit substitution to impersonate a known brand (high risk). Numbers like 0, 1, 3, 5 are used to replace letters (e.g., g00gle, paypa1, amaz0n).

visualHijackingRisk.message: CRITICAL: Visual hijacking attack detected (critical risk). A transparent overlay is attempting to intercept your clicks and redirect you to a malicious destination. This link has been blocked for your protection.

fullwidthCharsDetected.message: This domain contains Fullwidth Unicode characters (high risk). Fullwidth letters (like ａｐｐｌｅ) look identical to regular letters but are different characters, commonly used for phishing attacks.

cherokeeCharsDetected.message: This domain contains Cherokee script characters (high risk). Cherokee letters resemble Latin letters (like ꮓ looks like 'z') and are used to create convincing fake domains.

nonAsciiInBrandDomain.message: This domain contains non-ASCII characters in a brand-like context (high risk). Special characters are being used to impersonate a legitimate website.

maliciousDomainKeyword.message: CRITICAL: This domain contains keywords commonly associated with phishing or malware (critical risk). The domain name itself suggests malicious intent.

enclosedAlphanumericsDetected.message: This domain contains enclosed alphanumeric characters (high risk). Characters like ①②③ or ⓐⓑⓒ are used to create lookalike domains for phishing.

superscriptSubscriptDetected.message: This domain contains superscript or subscript characters (high risk). Characters like ¹²³ or ₀₁₂ are used to create deceptive lookalike domains.

numberFormsDetected.message: This domain contains number form characters (medium risk). Characters like ⅓, ⅔, or Roman numerals can be used to create confusing domain names.

nonAsciiCharactersDetected.message: This domain contains non-ASCII characters (medium risk). Special characters outside the standard alphabet may indicate an attempt to deceive users.

failSafeFreshInstallMessage.message: LinkShield protection is active. Please verify your license when possible.

universalNonAsciiDetected.description: Warning for URLs containing non-ASCII characters

emergencyModeMessage.message: LinkShield is running in Emergency Mode. Protection remains fully active. Please check your internet connection.

dangerousUriBlocked.message: A dangerous link type (like javascript:) was blocked for your safety.

TEST_MODE_ENABLED.message: Test mode is active - this is for development purposes only.

webTransportSuspiciousPattern.message: Suspicious network connection pattern detected (possible data exfiltration).

webTransportHighStreamCount.message: Unusual number of network streams detected (possible command & control activity).

imagelessQR.message: Hidden QR code detected (built from HTML elements instead of an image - evasion technique).

quotaExceededDesc.message: Daily limit reached - resets at midnight UTC

oauthTheftMessage.message: You tried to paste an authentication URL. This is a known phishing technique called 'ConsentFix' that steals your account access.

oauthTheftTip.message: Never paste URLs containing ?code= or access tokens into websites.

fakeTurnstileMessage.message: This page is displaying a fake Cloudflare verification. This is often used in phishing attacks.

splitQrMessage.message: A QR code split into multiple images was detected. This technique is used to evade security scanners.
